SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {above} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Riverbend Plantation}.

VE.A: Sunstone Farms's water usage is {1990865.38} cubic meters, Ironwood Ranch's water usage is {1965128.26} cubic meters, Riverbend Plantation's water usage is {1984285.95} cubic meters.

SC.Q: What is the average total Water Usage?
SC.A: The average total water usage is {7528688.61} cubic meters.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage go below 6829290.21 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage exceed 8064003.48 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage fall between 7074314.50 and 7818979.19 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 1983 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total water usage in 1983 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 1988 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total water usage in 1988 was {lower} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1987, was the average total Water Usage higher or lower than between 1986 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total water usage between 1984 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1985, was the average total Water Usage higher or lower than between 1983 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total water usage between 1984 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1985.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Sunstone Farms} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Riverbend Plantation, Ironwood Ranch, Sunstone Farms}.
